title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Note: The issue occurs consistently and affects all items in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
EB: The selected item should be highlighted and its corresponding actions/options should be available in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Verify that the selected item is highlighted and its corresponding actions/options are available in the library outline view.
